name: Stompin' Grounds
description:
Rollin’ over unstable ground... can you dodge the shockwaves and reach the end without falling down?

Controls:

  • WASD / Left stick = Move
  • Mouse / Right stick = Look around
  • i = Invert vertical look

Third party tools used:

  • DOTween by Demigiant (http://dotween.demigiant.com)

Updates:

  • 2021-10-07: added builds for WIN, MAC and Linux
  • 2021-10-06: added controller support & renamed game to "Stompin' Grounds"
